title: Policies
description: Learn about important company policies, responsibilities and regulations

title: Medical Requirements
description: Understanding medical requirements, medication procedures, and screening protocols

title: Preparation for Duty
description: Procedures and requirements for preparing for duty including documents, equipment, uniform and fitness

title: Signing On For Duty
description: Procedures and requirements for signing on for duty including safety critical license, document checks, and readiness requirements

title: Leaving Duty
description: Procedures and requirements for ending your shift including reports submission and checking next duty

title: Safety and Security
description: Critical safety and security procedures including reporting accidents, dealing with incidents, and responding to suspicious activities
